description:
Ready to share your knowledge and make good money from it? Welcome to this step-by-step guide on how to launch your first online course. I will show you everything you need to know to create the course that people will want to buy, will love, while actually having fun doing it. Selling infoproducts is the most lucrative niche of online marketing and with this training you are getting an exclusive ticket in.

1. You will discover how to choose the topics that sells - trust me, there is nothing worse that putting all this work and then not make a single sale

2. You will learn how to choose the right format for your course

3. You will get the necessary information about the required equipment so your course looks professional without spending tons of money (in fact, I’ll show you how to do it without spending a single dollar!)

4. How to structure and create your course

5. and much much more

If you feel like you’re ready to cross over and become a teacher, enjoy reaching hundreds of people and making money from it - this course is for you.
title: Launch Your First Online Product
